branchCategory.name: LEFB Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Belt Drive, (AC Servo Motor, 100/200/400W)
branchCategory.description: The AC servo version of the LEFB slider features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed and acceleration, as well as a size 40 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum speed: 2000 mm/s <LI>Maximum stroke: 3000 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.08 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: LEFB Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Belt Drive, (AC Servo Motor, 100/200/400W)

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LEF Series
